column4: I typed apt-cache search unix2dos and the result is tofrodos.  I tried typing todos foo, and this command is not found.  Is this package standard with 6.06?
just type unix2dos after installing tofrodos
So i have to install tofordos, it's not standard with the 6.06 packages?
i don't know if it's standard. i guess not, if you don't have unix2dos working
